thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: nice hotel with big rooms
thread.title_full: nice hotel with big rooms - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angelica K
title: nice hotel with big rooms
text:
I came to Paris for conference and was looking for hotel aroud the convention center. I liked my choice as it is near to metro (just 50 meters from hotel). even by walking it takes around 20 minutes to go to the convention center.
Big rooms were a nice surprise. for breakfast there are 2 options : coffee with croissant for 7 euro , or buffet for 15 euro. one day I tried buffet menu and came to conclusion it better to have breakfast outside for the same money. Just next to the hotel there is supermarket.
In the room there is coffee machine and each day they provide 4 capsules for free, although in my room there were always only 3 capsules. The hotel is clean. Very small elevator.
